product.productDes: Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max was officially released on October 13, 2020. The phone is powered by the new Apple A14 Bionic processor. The smartphone comes with a 6.7 inches Super Retina XDR OLED capacitive touchscreen, 2778 x 1284 pixels resolution and HDR display, True Tone and Wide color (P3) gamut.
